Name: Can You Escape
About the game: With elements of automation, puzzling and fun physics based machinery, you will have to figure out how to escape the lab! Setup automated systems to help you create power cubes and explore the lab! There are cube fusers, teleporters, shooters and much more to explore! Use your power cubes to buy even more machinery and power-ups to help make even more power cubes, because in this lab, power cubes are everything!
